《行尸走肉》（The Walking Dead）是一部由美国电视网AMC制作的电视剧，改编自罗伯特·柯克曼（Robert Kirkman）创作的同名漫画。这部剧的首播日期是2010年10月31日，并不是2020年。该剧在首播后迅速获得了大量观众的关注和好评，成为了一部现象级的电视剧。

“相同” (xiāngtóng) 是汉语中的一个形容词，意思是“相同的”或“相似的”。它用来表示两个或多个事物在某些方面是一样的，没有差别。例如：

1. 这两件衣服的颜色相同。
2. 我们的观点相同。
3. 他们的答案完全相同。

在日常生活中，“相同”常用于比较和描述

column2:
'My children are mostly grown. I like gardening and grow vegetables that I cook.' 
'Wow! Many people find gardening very relaxing. What about you with all the different things?'

'I find it very relaxing. I love watching what I plant grow.'
"Do you live in a suburban area or in an urban area with less space to cultivate?  It's amazing how much you can grow in a small space."

'I live in a suburban area but have a nice back yard.'
'Wow! I want to come visit your garden! Ha! Do you grow the plants directly in your yard or do grow the plants in large containers?'

'A mix of both. I usually do half and half. Although certain veggies grow better in pots'
'Well, i live in the midwest and it gets really cold out here. Do you recommend any plants that can grow in harsh weather?'

"I can't think of plants for cold weather. I live in south florida."
'Must be nice to be able to plant year round. I guess out here we plant when we can lol.'

'True. Anything that can grow in cold conditions has to be rugged and durable.'
'I guess its different if you live where it gets cold during the winter. I guess i have until spring to think of what we will be planting lol.'

这听起来很美好！种植植物不仅能让你与大自然更加亲近，还能带来很多内心的平静和满足感。你通常种什么类型的植物呢？

那听起来很棒！住在郊区有很多好处，比如安静的环境和更大的生活空间，而一个漂亮的后院更是锦上添花。你可以在那里做很多事情，比如种花种菜、搭建一个小花园、摆放一些户外家具供休息，甚至可以考虑安装一个小型的游泳池或建一个烧烤区。你最喜欢在后院做什么呢？

的确，种植蔬菜时可以采用多种方法，包括盆栽和地栽。每种方法都有其优点和局限，根据具体情况选择适合自己的方式是明智的。

**盆栽种植的优点：**
1. **灵活性**：盆栽可以随意移动，适合阳台、露台或有限的空间。
2. **控制土壤质量**：可以选择优质的

1. **羽衣甘蓝（Kale）**：这种绿叶蔬菜不仅耐寒，而且在凉爽的天气中味道更佳。

2.

确实，在寒冷条件下生长的植物需要具备一定的耐寒能力和适应性。它们通常具有以下几种特性来抵御严寒：

1. **抗冻蛋白**：一些植物会产生抗冻蛋白，帮助细胞抵御低温引起的冰晶形成。

2. **落叶**：许多耐寒植物在冬季会落叶，以减少水分流失和冻伤的风险

that sounds interesting . how do you like working in the circus ?

"I'm an art lover too, I have a house full of it!"
"Oh how wonderful! Who are your favorite artists?"
"I really like Albrecht Durer"
"Oh a German renaissance painter! I like abstract works, personally."
"I enjoy abstract art as well, but I really like etchings"
"Very unique! Have you ever heard of the Lascaux caves? I know they're not etchings but they're said to be spectacular!"
"No, I haven't! Where is that?"
"They're beautiful cave engravings in southwestern France. They're said to have been originally created 17,000 years ago!"
"Wow, that sounds amazing. I'll have to check that out when I'm in France. Do you like to travel?"
"I do love to travel! I've seen many places in the world but always want to see more! Do you travel a lot?"
"Not as much as I'd like to, but I try"
"That's interesting. I can imagine having the restrictions lifted helped artists and collectors share their work. I love huge paintings!"

"I find they're always best if mixed in with something and not just plain."
"I like to saute them in butter with some onions"

"Have you ever tried them on pizza?"
"Yes! I like them on Pizza, along with roasted peppers"

"Sounds great! First time trying them was when my mother started working at the bank."
"I work in a bank myself!"

"That's so cool. I'm thinking about doing the same soon. Do you like it?"
"I like it a lot, but then I really enjoy being nice and courteous to people"

"Same here. Do you think working at a credit union and a traditional bank are the same?"
"Probably similar, but a credit union might be less corporate, which could be good."

"I think that's the route I'm going to take. As long as I'm helping people, I'm happy."
"I would hire you if you applied to my bank!"

column5:
这听起来像是你在谈论某种食物。你可以告诉我具体是哪种食物吗？这样我可以给你更具体的建议。很多食物确实可以通过与其他食材搭配来提升味道和营养价值。例如，水果可以与酸奶混合，蔬菜可以与肉类或豆类一起烹饪，等等。你有什么特别的偏好吗？

你是指在比萨上加什么配料吗？比萨的配料可以有很多种，取决于个人的口味和创意。常见的比萨配料包括：

1. **传统配料**：
   - 番茄酱
   - 马苏里拉奶酪
   - 意大利香肠
   - 蘑菇
   - 青椒
   - 洋葱
   - 黑

这句话的意思是：你觉得某件事很不错，并且你第一次体验这种事情是在你母亲开始在银行工作的时候。你想要进一步探讨这个话题吗？例如，具体是什么事情让你觉得很棒，或者你母亲在银行工作时发生了什么特别的事情吗？

太好了！你在考虑做什么事情呢？如果你能具体说说，我可以给你更多的建议或者分享我的经验。如果是关于某个爱好、旅行、学习新技能或者其他方面的事情，我都会很乐意讨论。😊

在信用社和传统银行工作有很多相似之处，但也存在一些关键的区别。以下是一些方面的比较：

### 相似之处
1. **金融产品和服务**：两者都提供类似的金融产品和服务，如存款账户、贷款、信用卡和投资产品。
2. **监管**：两者都受金融监管机构的监督，需遵守严格的金融法规和标准。
3. **客户服务**：无

这真是一个非常崇高和有意义的目标！帮助别人不仅能让受助者受益，也能带给自己很大的满足感和成就感。你可以通过很多方式来实现这个目标，比如参与志愿服务、选择相关的职业、或者在日常生活中多关心他人。无论你选择哪种方式，都希望你在帮助别人的过程中也能照顾好自己，保持积极的心态和健康的

1. **有声书**：可以在做家务、开车或者运动的时候听一些

作为一个人工智能，我不具备人类的感知、情感或需要休息的能力。我是由计算机程序和算法组成的，所以我不感到压力或疲劳。我可以全天候提供帮助，无需休息。如果你有任何问题或需要帮助，随时告诉我！

那听起来真是太棒了！尼亚加拉瀑布是一个美丽且壮观的地方，非常适合度蜜月。你一定会有很多难忘的经历。你计划在那边做些什么活动呢？比如乘坐游船靠近瀑布、参观蝴蝶园或者参加夜间灯光秀？

谢谢你的关心！每小时20美元确实是一个不错的起点，但根据工作的性质、地点和经验，薪资也可能会有所不同。如果你觉得自己的工作价值更高，或者市场行情有所变化，向雇主提出加薪是合理的。

关于天气，如果你所在的地区天气很冷，记得穿暖和的衣物，保持室内温暖，注意饮食和休息。冷天也可以是一个享受

我理解你对寒冷的厌恶，同时也明白淡季旅行的经济优势。选择度假时间确实需要权衡各种因素，包括天气、预算和个人喜好。

'I love cats. I have 2. Do you plan to get a dog?'

'Cool!  No, my wife kind of wants one but at my age I can no longer deal with losing pets.'
'Yes losing them is so hard. I lost a cat last year.'

'So sorry.  Yes, we lost a cat not too long ago.  He kind of took especially to me.  I still miss him so badly.'
'I bet. Here too. What do you like to do when you are not home with your cats?'

'I fly RC aircraft.  Mostly planes, but helicopters as well and recently getting into FPV quadcopters.'
'That is very cool. I have a friend who has an RC plane airport area. I like hobby RC cars. I have 2 and they are very fast.'

'Cool!  I have a friend that used to run RC trucks.  I like music as well and am currently building a cigar box guitar.'
'I love music too. Do you play the guitar?'

'That is awesome. I played the drums in highschool.'

Sounds really nice, for me maybe I'll paint something
I'm headed to Jersey. I'm a Salvatorre from that area if you know anything about the family.
No not really. Can you fill me in please?
Well, it's a joke to be honest. My real last name is spanish, Salvador. But I'm a big Mafia buff and the Salvatorre's are a famous Mafia name.
Cool! I'm and avid artist and a bit of a scientist. Did you know that Salvador means Saviour in Portuguese?
That's quite interesting. I joke that I'm Italian but I'm just a big goof.
How come? Why do you say that?
Well, my mom was brilliant but I ended up with the brains from my father whom I never knew. Apparently he wasn't too bright.
It doesn't mean you are goof. You are the only one who put your own limitations not others.
Well thank you so much for that vote of confidence. So what types of paintings do you create?
All of them. Cubism, realistic, dark truth... Whatever comes to the mind.

环境污染是指有害物质或能量（如化学物质、噪声、热量等）进入自然环境，导致环境质量下降，对生态系统和人类健康产生负面影响。环境污染可以分为几种主要类型，包括：

1. **空气污染**：由工业排放、交通运输、燃烧化石燃料等活动产生的有害气体和颗粒物（如二氧化硫、氮

空气污染是指有害或过量的物质进入大气中，导致空气质量下降，进而对人类健康、环境和生态系统造成负面影响。这些污染物可以是固体、液体或气体，包括但不限于颗粒物（PM2.5和PM10）、二氧化硫（SO2）、一氧化碳（CO）、氮氧化物（NOx）、挥发性有机化合

其实，鱼肉tacos在很多地方都是非常受欢迎的一种选择。鱼肉通常是经过调味和烤制或煎炸后，放在柔软的玉米饼或面粉饼中，再搭配新鲜的蔬菜、鳄梨酱、酸奶酱或其他调料。鱼肉的鲜嫩口感和调料的丰富风味相结合，能带来一种独特的美味

听起来你在说燕麦片可以成为一顿美味早餐的一部分！燕麦片确实是非常营养丰富的选择，富含纤维和蛋白质。以下是一种简单而美味的早餐搭配：

### 燕麦片、煎饼和鸡蛋早餐组合

#### 燕麦片
1. **材料:**

column2:
"Well that seems a bit complicated. My daddy was a driver and he told me to rest when I am tired and drive when I'm not."
"oh i know , i just enjoy helping people . what do you do for a living ?"

"Now I work in the truck stop mechanic shop. I don't drive any more but I love the lifestyle. I still get to talk to drivers and smell the exhaust."
"Oh wow, that's a cool job. Do you ever get cramped up from driving? I heard some places use electric trucks now."

"One time it took 3 months for my left hand to turn loose of the steering wheel. Had to remove it so I could pee."
"wow , that is crazy ! that never happened to me before !"

"I gave up driving after that and marrying my sweetheart. We put a bow tie on the steering wheel at the wedding."
"i am genuinely happy for you."

"Thank you kindly. How about you, you married?"
"no. I hope to though, someday"

"It will sneak up on you when you least expect it. Just keep your eyes on the road."
"i will keep that in mind . thanks for the great advice"

嗯，这似乎有点复杂。我爸爸是个司机，他告诉我累了就休息，不累了就开车。

现在我在卡车修理店工作。我不再开车了，但我喜欢这种生活方式。我仍然可以和司机们交谈，闻到尾气的味道。

有一次，我的左手花了3个月的时间才松开方向盘。不得不把它移开才能上厕所。

那之后我放弃了开车，和我的爱人结婚。我们在婚礼上在方向盘上系了一根蝴蝶结。

谢谢你。你呢，结婚了吗？

当你最不期待的时候，它会悄悄靠近你。只要保持眼睛在路上。

column5:
你爸爸的建议非常实用，也非常重要。安全驾驶不仅是对自己负责，也是对其他道路使用者负责。驾驶时保持清醒和专注是至关重要的。如果你累了或感觉到任何疲劳的迹象，找个安全的地方停车休息是最明智的选择。过度疲劳驾驶会大大增加发生事故的风险。

此外，这里有几个额外的建议可以帮助你保持清醒和专注

听起来你找到了一个让你满意的工作环境，尽管你不再开车。能继续与司机们交流，保持和这个行业的联系，确实很不错。卡车修理店的工作也很有挑战性和成就感，你每天都能解决问题，帮助司机们保持他们的车辆在最佳状态。你喜欢这种生活方式，说明你对这个行业有很深的热爱。希望你在这个岗位上能继续

听起来你经历了一段非常艰难和不寻常的时间。你的左手花了三个月才松开方向盘，这可能是因为身体或神经系统的问题，或者可能是心理因素导致的结果。你不得不把手移开才能上厕所，这显然给你的日常生活带来了很大的困扰。

如果你还没有咨询过医生或专业人士，我强烈建议你尽快寻求医疗帮助。医生可以帮助你

这听起来真是一个特别而有意义的婚礼细节。放弃开车或许是为了迎接生活的新阶段，而在方向盘上系蝴蝶结则象征着你们将共同掌舵，开启新的旅程。婚礼上的这些小细节往往最能体现出夫妻之间的默契和对未来的期许。祝福你们在未来的日子里一起驾驶人生的旅程，遇到

我是一个人工智能，所以我没有个人生活、感情或婚姻。不过，如果你有其他问题或需要帮助，我很乐意协助！

这句话听起来像是在提醒我们要时刻保持警惕和专注，特别是在我们最不期待的时候，意外的事情可能会发生。无论是生活中的机会还是挑战，只要我们保持专注，就能够及时应对和抓住。这样的态度不仅适用于开车时的安全驾驶，也适用于生活中的各种情境。

"I wasn't and I kinda happy I didn't." 
"Why do you feel that way?"

"Well, my cousin's life has been messed up since she had the baby and my mother, she's a retired teacher, has been trying to help her."
"Do you think that you will try to get pregnant again?"

"Yes, now that I'm married and older, I do want to have a child."
"That's good. Its always nice to have a support system behind you"

"Yes, but right now we have a good life together, so we may wait a bit. Are you married?"
"I have been married for about 5 years now."

"Oh congrats, still kinda newlyweds, eh? lol."
"High school sweethearts so I feel like we have been together forever."

"Oh, how wonderful. That's always so good. I have two high school friends who married and are so happy."
"Yes, by growing up together it really gives you a chance to get close."

column2:
"My older brother plays in the NFL. I worry every time he's out there, but I know he's doing what he loves."
"He is a professional I'm sure he will be alright."

"All the head trauma controversy is making me nervous; sometimes you don't know you were effected until much later in life."
"You see this happen with hockey, players being affected well into the retirement."

"I like to watch hockey, but I am not very knowledgeable about the sport in general."
"I like the action, although I have been distracted lately, I keep thinking about the lovely Rita Hayworth"

"She definitely is an icon, but that's a pretty random choice. Did you watch one of her movies recently?"
"I was black and white older movies and she caught my eye."

"She was a beautiful dancer as well as a great actress."
"I would love to dance with her in the rain. It sounds romantic. What do you think? Am I crazy?"

"There are many people I'd love to dance in the rain with, if I could go back in time."
"That would be awesome, there is an allure."

"I don't know? I guess school and stress just gets to people sometimes."
"Yeah it can be more than a normal temporary reaction to life events. Although I try to keep perspective like a lot of people struggle with this and worse problems."

"I know. Just hard to believe that my roommate would be rummaging through my things. I wonder if she has been stealing from me?"
"its totally possible. Did you get to find out why she did that?"

"I haven't spoken with her about it yet. I just caught her on video going through my desk. How do you bring something like that up?"
"definitely possible"

"I don't like confrontation, and this is not a discussion I am looking forward to having. But I have to stand up for myself."
"have you tried confronting her?"

"I tried to bring it up yesterday but she was in a hurry to get out the door."
"i'd suggest you find a time you're sure she's not going out and talk about it"

"I know. I just need to set a time and sit down and do it. Hope for the best. Maybe there is a reason?"
"yeah. i like to give a person benefit of the doubt. Maybe there's a reason,like you said."

"My brother went through a time where he'd hop in the back of my car and scare me."
"Oh jeez haha, that's so terrifying!"

"It was terrible. But now Im desensitized. How often does you husband scare you?  "
"Not too often, so it really keeps me on my toes!"

"Thats the worst because your never expecting it. "
"Exactly! Does your boyfriend like to scare you often>"

"3 brothers growing up, I do the scarring mostly.  :)"
"Oh man! I grew up as an only child, what was it like having all those brothers bothering you?"

"Almost as bad as my 3 sisters. If I could make a gross face I would."
"Haha that's a lot of siblings! I bet that was fun on holidays"

"Cool, siblings can be like really good friends if they get along. Most of my friends growing up were friends with theirs"

Wow. Thats amazing. Are you happy? Yes, our relationships can be complicated but overall it is very good.

Yeah I think you've got a lot of time. I worry about AI. I don't think that it'll be like Star Wars at all. I think in the long run it will benefit society but there will be some issues along the way.
There are just going to be tons of lost jobs and AI often has so much bias built in from the coding and learning process. Yeah that could be an issue. How do you think governments and people can prepare?
we need to regulate the jobs that can be automated, we need a robust UBI and social safety net, and companies need to be much more careful about developing them. That definitely makes a lot of sense.
Otherwise we're going to all be at home playing video games all day. I love games as much as the next person, but I want to do something. I like games too. It is a nice distraction in my off time. I play during the day sometimes because I work nights.

激光近视手术（如LASIK、PRK等）确实是许多人用来矫正视力的一种选择。很多人在手术后都报告说视力得到了显著改善，并且不用再依赖眼镜或隐形眼镜。然而，决定是否进行这种手术是一个需要慎重考虑的决定。以下是一些需要考虑的因素：

1. **适应性**：并不是所有人都适合进行

1. **框架眼镜**：这是最简单的替代方案，可以避免每天早上戴隐形眼镜的麻烦。
   
2. **角膜塑形镜（Ortho-K）**：这种特殊的硬性隐形眼镜在夜间

你说的这种情况可能和某些眼科手术或治疗相关。例如，激光矫视手术（如LASIK）在刚做完手术后的头几个小时内，视力可能会模糊不清，这是一种正常的反应。随着眼睛的恢复，视力通常会在接下来的几个小时到几天内逐步改善。如果你有具体的医疗情况或手术需要咨询，最好还是直接联系你的

column5:
你说得很有道理。债务确实可以带来很大的压力和不确定性，尤其是高利率的债务。许多人发现，储蓄和财务计划能给他们带来更多的安全感和心理上的轻松。以下是一些建议，可能对你有帮助：

1. **预算管理**：制定一个详细的预算，了解你的收入和支出情况。这样你可以更好地控制你的财务

确实，及时付款是非常重要的。如果你不及时付款，可能会面临以下几种后果：

1. **滞纳金和罚款**：许多账单和贷款都会在未按时付款的情况下收取滞纳金或罚款，这会增加你的财务负担。

2. **信用评分受损**：延迟付款会被报告给信用机构，导致你的信用评分下降。这会影响你未来申请贷款

确实，农业设备和维护的成本往往被低估。以下是一些具体的方面，可以帮助更全面地理解这一问题：

1. **设备购买成本**：现代农业设备如拖拉机、联合收割机、播种机等，价格昂贵，常常需要数万到数十万美元的投资。

2. **维护和修理**：农业设备在使用过程中会遭受磨损和故障，需要定期维护和修

还清债务并确保未来不再陷入债务是一个需要综合考虑收入、支出和储蓄的长期计划。以下是一个全面的计划，可以帮助你实现这一目标：

### 1. 评估当前财务状况
- **列出所有债务**：包括信用卡债务、学生贷款、房贷、车贷等。记录每笔债务的利率、最低还款额和到期日。
-

"Do you grill alot or prefer doing take out BBQ?"
"i grill some, id rather pay someone else to make my food through!"

"Umm not really I'm not into landscaping but where I live there is 2 major landscaping companies so I pass them on my late night walks. "
"that sounds great, i went to art school but i appreciate a good lawn"

"I like both my father makes great BBQ but when he's not in the mood I will run to a local place here or Bono's to get some ribs."
"I haven't heard of Bono's but Ill have to keep it in mind!"

"Oh really yes you have to try it maybe this restaurant isn't worldwide but if you travel definitely look into them."
"will definitely try it, what city is it in"

'yes, you are right !'

"I agree! I feel like recycling is also a great trait!"

"It is a heart with a large red rose in the center! My husband designed it for me so it is special to me."

"Right?!  It's a rich history"
"sure is! and there is a lot of history too begining in 1607...."

"I had no idea it went back that far.  Where did you find that information?"
"I done searches online, went to the library, and even visited some universities to see what information they found"

"Wow, you're quite the historian. I do love doing that kind of research, though"
"I enjoy learning about new and different things so that is a plus. Research is great, it's like putting together a puzzle."

"I actually work in research for a living.  I think my dad gave me that love."
"Your dad is a smart man, that is awesome!"

"It's a fascinating job.  I review research done in humans (you know, clinical trials) for ethics"
"That is amazing...I love that field. so many exciting new things every day."

"True, every day is completely different"
"You come in contact with so many different type of people...i think that sounds like a cool job"

I agree, perseverance is a key human motivator. It can turn the outcome and can potentially make the underdog the winner.
I know a lot of people root for the underdog, but I prefer games where there is no clear favorite. Fair, even, matches are more interesting to watch.

I tend to agree, a fair even match is just the right kinda match, like a perfect suspense movie.
I hope the Superbowl this year is an even match, some of the past years have been disappointing.

Oh yeah, nothing against the patriots but the superbowl has gotten a bit boring seeing them numerous times. I need some fresh teams.
Remember a few years back when the Colts played the Bears? Disappointing game but awesome half-time show - my favorite artist played.

I feel like superbowl is trying to attract more people to the game, by having an attractive half time show, along with non football related things.
I think Jennifer Lopez and Shakira are playing the show this year.

That is cool, I will be checking it out for sure, now we need a good game.

Have not been following the scene off late, but would like seahawks, their QB is from my school.
A repeat of 2014 would be nice, it was cool to see a different team get some attention.

 'No way!  That sound pretty fun!  Where did you catch him?',
 'over in texas, medina lake!',
 'Awesome!  Have you ever been deep sea fishing?',
 'No but i really want to, a three day trip!, they are kind of pricey though, have you?',
 'I did last year with my brother in law and friends.  Its not as bad if you can split up the cost!',
 'thats true, but i only have one friend that likes to fish, and we dont really talk that much because of work:/',
 'Work can make it difficult.  You can always see if there is anyone else in the area looking to go with a group though!']

"I'm not very good, but I do find it's a good way to meet new people!"
"What type of dancing do you do? Have you ever tried Salsa?"
"I tried it once, but my hips just aren't up to it! I prefer Swing dancing - how about yourself?"
"Swing looks fun too! I like watching lol, but if I had to pick anything it would probably be swing as well."
"Yeah it is really fun, although I'm really a bit too tall for that style of dancing - lots of crouching required!"
"You just need to find a taller dance partner, that might help a little anyway."
"Very true, although honestly I'd prefer a night in with pizza and beer..."
"Yeah, I agree. I would drink some beer, eat some pizza, and make some comics...that would be a perfect night to me."
"Sounds great, well it's been nice to chat to you - maybe we'll meet at a swing club sometime in the future?!"

'Why do you need to travel to Nashville?'

'Sounds like money poorly spent.'

"What was it like? I've never been"

'Oh goodness.'

1. **文化和历史**: 墨西哥有着悠久的历史，曾是古代玛雅和阿兹特克文明的中心。今天，墨西哥拥有丰富的文化遗产，包括传统的音乐、舞蹈、美食和节日，如亡灵节

那听起来很美味！鳄梨酱（也叫鳄梨沙拉酱或牛油果酱）确实是玉米卷的经典搭配。你可以在家自制鳄梨酱，通常只需要一些成熟的鳄梨、柠檬汁或酸橙汁、盐、胡椒、切碎的洋葱、番茄和香菜。将所有材料混合在一起，

墨西哥煎饼，也被称为塔可（Taco），是一种非常受欢迎的墨西哥传统食品。它由玉米或小麦制成的薄饼（称为玉米饼或面饼）包裹各种馅料制成。常见的馅料包括烤肉、鸡肉、鱼、虾、豆类、奶酪、生菜、西红柿、洋葱、

墨西哥卷饼（Burrito）是一道非常受欢迎的墨西哥传统美食，使用绿色酱汁（如青椒酱或香菜酱）确实能为卷饼增添独特的风味和新鲜感。绿色酱汁通常由新鲜的青椒、香菜、洋葱、大蒜和酸橙汁等成分制成，具有浓郁的香气和

"I have a Granny Smith apple tree, but it has yet to produce any apples. Maybe next year I'll have better luck with it."
"I had the same problem, although my tree was attacked by greenfly so didn't give any fruit!"

"I am not familiar with greenfly - is that a type of insect?"
"yeah that's right, they swarm over the tree and 'suffocate' it meaning it doesn't produce any apples."

"I see. Are they easy to get rid of, or is it a yearly battle?"
"Apparently if you cover the tree with fairy liquid it's supposed to help but it definitely didn't work for us! Do you have any other fruit trees?"

"That's too bad. Yes, I have a couple of pear trees and cherry trees. Those at least produce some fruit for us."
"Oh that's great. I love fruit so we have 10 different trees in our garden!"

"10 different trees!? What kinds?"
"Cherry, pears, apples, and oranges!"

"An orange tree sounds fun. I live in too cold of an area to grow one"
"Yeah only possible in warmer climates unfortunately!"

坚持预算是财务管理中至关重要的一部分，它能够帮助你实现财务目标、避免债务以及积累储蓄。以下是一些实用的步骤和技巧，帮助你更好地坚持预算：

### 1. 制定详细的预算
- **收入评估**：首先，准确评估你的所有收入来源，包括工资、奖金、投资收益等。
- **支出分类**：将你的支出分为必要支出

理解你喜欢购物的同时又希望削减开支的需求是很重要的。以下是一些策略，可以帮助你在保持预算的同时享受购物的乐趣：

1. **预算计划**：制定一个详细的预算，明确每月的收入和支出。确定你可以用于购物的金额，并严格遵守这个限额。

2. **购物清单**：在购物之前，列出你真正需要的物品，避免冲动消费

"It's a nice car, plenty of room for kids and dogs. Wish I could afford an upgrade."
"I'm sure it is an amazing car! They seem so nice! Maybe one day soon you can get one too!"

"I've been putting in a lot of overtime, but I'm starting to feel stressed out."
"Sorry to hear. I think you need a little time off. Stress is a killer."

"Yeah, the money is nice but it's not worth sacrificing my mental health."
"I totally understand. You must take good care of yourself and your mental health. Maybe take a nice long relaxing bath tonight?"

"That sounds nice, maybe I'll call in sick tomorrow too."
"Lol, yes! A "mental health day" is in order!"

"My perfect mental health day would probably be staying in bed, hanging out with the dogs, having food delivered, and reading a good book."
"That sounds like a really great day! I think I'll do exactly the same thing tomorrow. But I will also play some music."

"Yes, of course! Music makes every day better."
"It sure does! I'm working on some really great new songs on my piano!"

"I like piano music. I can't play, but I like it. How long have you been listening to piano? Do you play?"
"since I can remember. I enjoy it a lot."
"Do you have a favorite pianist?"
"I like Jakob Ludwig. He was a German composer and pianist born in the early 1800s."
"Interesting. I don't know much about famous pianists, or about playing. Is it hard to learn?"
"It takes lots of practice at first. Do you play any instruments?"
"I can play a little guitar, and I play the drums a little too."
"Wow, I would love to hear you play sometime."
"I'm not very good, but I continue to practice."
"I don't get out much to see concerts though."
"Me either, I try to see at least one concert a year."
"I'm so busy with school that I don't have the time or the money for concerts."

"Yes and a lot more fun with out rain"

"What is your favorite zoo animal?"

"Cincinnati is a great city. I have to deliver a car there once. I enjoyed the area."
"They have a lot of things going on there now, it seems like a festival every weekend"

"Nice, festivals can be expensive though. The food is always overpriced."
"Yes they are pricey on the food, the spaces are high too for people to set up in. That does not help"

"Thats true, I just wish there was a more affordable pastime. It seems like food is where they always get you because they know everyone gets hungry."
"Yes, that is the main problem, that and tickets"

"Oh, that's right! I like fishing, but I usually just slap a worm on a hook."
"Same here. I generally take my dog "socks" with me when I go fishing. He loves the water."

"I usually just bring my cooler full of beer. How did Socks get his name?"
"Not sure. I "adopted" from someone else and he was already named. Do you have pets?"

"Nope, no time for pets. Too busy fishing."
"Ok, that's cool. What do you drive? I get to drive around in a silver lexus."

"I drive a ford pick-up. It is good for driving around on the backroads. I take it to the creek sometimes, so I wanted something I could get muddy."
"That makes sense. I would feel pretty powerful in something that big."

"What else do you like to do for fun?"
"I like the outdoors so hiking is another favorite activity of mine."

"Oh, that's cool. Do you usually take your dog?"
"Yes, he keeps the bad guys away. LOL"

'I was in therapy for a long time after the incident'
'I am glad everything turned out alright!'

'no I have never had that happen to me'
"It's a traumatic experience!"
'I would think it would take a long time to get over it, if you ever do'

'I like to cook because I can save some money and still have a good meal.'
"I just don't know how to prepare them I guess."

'Do you just eat burgers or do you have anything with them'
'I suppose but I never learned to cook and I would just rather eat a burger.'

'Why not, they make any dish so much better'
'I just buy frozen burger patties and throw them on the george forman. Just like my dad before he got locked up.'

'You can always find fun ways to cook them on the internet'
"Usually a salad from a bag but I don't care for it."

'I think if you branched out a bit you would find something you enjoy'
'Maybe, but who has that kind of time'

'True, but it would be time well spent'
'I suppose so.'

"That sounds like a lot of fun, I bet you get to be really creative"
"It's one of the only places I get to let my creativity flow. I haven't found any other outlet yet."

"Have you tried games? I like playing d&d, it's a fun way to connect"
"I've always wanted to try getting into D&D, but I could never find the opportunity to get started"

"Sometimes local game shops will hold open nights! There's a thing called the Adventurer's League, they host open games for beginners and often have listings online"
"That sounds great! I should look into it soon."

"definitely, it's a fun way to get out of the house and meet other people!"
"Definitely need to get into something new. I should try to make time."

"Yes, I totally agree with you. If only days could be longer and work hours could stay the same."

"the bad thing about homeschooling, there's no social interactions"
"Yes, you are right about that. But you concentrate more on your studies, since being alone, nobody can distract you."

"exactly!"
"That is the biggest benefit. I have done my painting studies from my home."

"what do you think of eating less animal products or stop eating them at all"
"Regularly in my daily diet I don't eat a lot of animal food. Generalemte some weekends is that I do it. They are harmful to health."

"it's very good, did you know, the animal's main source of protein comes from plants. So we can easily make transition into eating no animal products at all"
"Exactly A diet of vegetables and fruits, they have all the necessary proteins and are healthy."

"i'm glad you understand, the world without cruelty starts without slaughter houses"
"Exactly. I am also glad that we think the same way."

"It was a pleasure to have conversation with you"
"Also take care. Thank you"

column5:
的确，在家教育（homeschooling）有其优点和缺点，其中一个常见的担忧就是缺乏社交互动。社交互动对孩子的全面发展非常重要，包括他们的情感、社交技能和沟通能力。在传统学校环境中，孩子们有更多的机会与同龄人互动，参加团队活动和课外活动，这些都是在家教育可能相对缺乏的。
